Blog Projects Research About

Kurt Junshean Espinosa

My research is about concept representations which cuts across machine learning and linguistics.

What is a concept? How do we represent it? How can we teach the computers to learn concepts over time? These are some questions I have in my research.

Publications

See my Google Scholar page.

Activities

2016 September: Joined the COLING Twitter NER Shared-Task - won 3rd place!

  • The task consists of identification of named-entities in a tweet and classification of its entity type (e.g. location, person, organisation, etc).
